sentences.en: Antifungal creams and sprays are also effective at managing the infection.
sentences.cn: 抗真菌的药膏和喷剂也可有效的防治感染.

sentences.en: Benzoic acid has antibacterial and antifungal properties.
sentences.cn: 苯甲酸具有抗菌和杀真菌的特性.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Iron ion can join in the antifungal action of Ciclopirox against Microsporum can i.
sentences.cn: 结论: 铁离子参与了抗真菌药物环吡酮胺对犬小孢子菌的抑菌作用.

sentences.en: In addition the mucous membranes are covered with fluids containing antifungal substances.
sentences.cn: 还有粘膜表面液体中的抗菌物质.

sentences.en: Inhibits platelet aggregation. DNA polymerase inhibitor. Shows antifungal activity.
sentences.cn: 抑制血小板聚集. DNA聚合酶抑制剂. 显示抗真菌活性.

sentences.en: It is proved that the self - made antifungal agentantifungal effect , by the inhibition.
sentences.cn: 根据所报道的各种防霉剂特性,自配了针对变色移膜革的复合型防霉剂.

sentences.en: It’s treated with nonprescription antifungal creams.
sentences.cn: 可通过涂抹非处方的抗真菌乳膏进行治疗。

sentences.en: Novel antifungal antibiotics from microorganism have been found one after another.
sentences.cn: 近几年来,新的微生物来源的抗真菌药物不断涌现.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the mechanism of interferance of iron ion with the antifungal drug - Ciclopirox olamine.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探索抗真菌药物环吡酮胺可能的作用机制.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To evaluate the disc diffusion method on the clinical antifungal susceptibility test for yeast - like fungi.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨纸片扩散法在酵母样真菌药敏试验中的临床应用价值.

sentences.en: Results Amphotericin B is a potent antifungal agent with a broad antifungal spectrum.
sentences.cn: 结果两性霉素B是抗菌谱广、抗菌作用强的抗真菌药物.

sentences.en: Saccharide as a substance of energy and information has strong antifungal bioactivity.
sentences.cn: 糖类物质,作为一种能量和信息的单元,具有很好的抑菌活性.

sentences.en: Since CPA responds to long-term antifungal therapy, improved case detection should be urgently undertaken.
sentences.cn: 由于长期抗真菌治疗对慢性肺曲霉病有很好的疗效,应尽快加强病例检测。

sentences.en: Sprinkle antifungal powder on your feet and in your shoes daily.
sentences.cn: 每天在脚上和鞋里撒些抗真菌的药粉.

sentences.en: Strongly antibacterial and antifungal, garlic can help with yeast infections, some sinus infections, and the common cold.
sentences.cn: 大蒜具有的很强的抗细菌、抗真菌特性有助于抑制酵母菌感染，如某些鼻窦感染和感冒。

sentences.en: These novel antifungal agents present a broader antifungal spectrum and a more effective antifungal activity.
sentences.cn: 这些药物具有更广的抗真菌谱,提供了更好的抗真菌活性.

sentences.en: TRPV 1 agonist. Analgesic. Has antifungal, antimicrobial and antioxidant properties.
sentences.cn: TRPV1收缩剂. 止痛剂. 具有抗真菌 、 抗微生物和抗氧化特性.

sentences.en: You may prefer using an over - the - counter antifungal powder, cream, or spray.
sentences.cn: 你也可以使用非处方的抗真菌药粉, 药膏或喷剂.
